It's a huge problem during this pandemic as work requires a consistent connection for an internet based program and frequent zoom style meetings so I am having to use my cell as a hotspot (and I am definitely not looking forward to getting that inflated phone bill.) Review.Titre: Local ISP but outsourced support, also carrier-level NAT
Review.Contenu: The Good: service is reliable so far; getting speeds close to advertised (25/7 mbps). More upload bandwidth than the other WISP (Bluespan). Friendly install technician (Justin) wore a mask inside and did a clean professional job. No long-term contract or cancellation fee means it's low risk to try.The Bad: Simply Bits has chosen to put your router in jail behind carrier-level NAT with a private IP address that is not routable from the rest of the internet. This means that if you want to connect to devices on your home network from somewhere else (e.g. using VPN or port forwarding), you need to use some other workaround (like a Wireguard tunnel to a publicly routable server somewhere else). SB does not warn you of this, you only find out once you buy the service and see that your router gets a WAN IP address in private (RFC 1918) space. Yes, the world has only 4 billion public IPv4 addresses, but $100/month service should get you one of them, or at least a public IPv6 address. SB will sell you a public, static IP address for an extra $15/month on top of service that is already more expensive than the cable company. Nearly every other residential ISP (including Cox) gives you a dynamically-assigned public IPv4 address as part of their basic service offering, no extra charge.The Ugly: SB has outsourced their tech support to the lowest-bidding call center whose primary job is to prevent you from talking to anyone local who knows what they are doing. On day one, I called to ask for help diagnosing an ethernet duplex mismatch between SB's CPE radio and my own network gear. I had a simple request for SB: try manually setting the network port on their radio to full-duplex, let me test, then set back to auto-negotiate, and let me test again. To anyone who has dealt with computer networks for a living, this is a basic, easy request, but it greatly confused the outsourced CSR who was hesitant to escalate it. Among other chaff and flares, he told me it was after hours and I would need to call back tomorrow between 8 AM and 5 PM... at 3:08 PM, on a Monday! After being told to contact my network equipment vendor about 6 times, he finally transferred me to a local Simply Bits engineer, Cody, who immediately understood the request and helped me resolve it. I wish SB would just let me speak with someone like Cody when I need it. The outsourced tech support is unprofessional and insulting, especially for a local company that might ostensibly care about local customer support.

We enjoyed our Simply Bits account but got a new house without stairs. Not in Simply Bits area anymore, they charged me $200.00 for early contract closing. They also charged me for another month of service.Read the small print.

Not clear on their billing practices. Charged me on the 5th of February for 1 month of service then charged me again on the 25th of February before I got payed. They then dinged me $25 fee for a declined payment when it's been only 20 days from my last payment. They then send me an email after the late charges are assessed and state they "always invoice" the 20th of every month. This only after I sent them an email asking why I was being charged twice.I gave 3 stars bc other than the shady billing practices I have no complaints on the performance of the internet thus far. Sadly, I really wanted to share a good review for this company but this issue can not be overlooked.

Review.Titre: Decent provider when you have few options
Review.Contenu: I live where I have no higher speed internet options, and only a few similar speed options.  If I had access to cable or high speed internet through anyone else I wouldn't use Simplibits.  This doesn't mean that Simplibit isn't any good, it means they are okay with reasonable, but not great, speed.  I've found the service to be quite reliable in terms of lack of service interruptions.  I find throughput to be a bit lumpy at what is likely their prime time, as I'm a residential customer.  I also run voice through Simplibits without QOS.  The majority of the time voice quality is fine.  It is nice that someone actually answers and speaks to you when you call either their admin or service organizations.

Review.Titre: I received this request for a review…
Review.Contenu: I received this request for a review after the initial phone call, so not much to evaluate.  We will have to wait 10 days for a visit to set up service.  Sooner would have been great.
The speed is slow streaming shows/ movies.  It has to buffer way to often.  Never had this problems glen w  DSL.  We unfortunately don't have access to other providers r other than satellite

Review.Titre: Access is lost at least once a day
Review.Contenu: We loose access at least once a day ,,close to mid-night ... Also lately we have to reset the modem for a couple of minutes to regain access and when we call support "ALL is OK" !!
I love the service support, but feel losing internet and speed have happened too often - like had to call in June & July.  Still not getting the speed that I expected/desired.
Installation was pretty good. Service is pretty much was I would expect with a few outages / speed slowing about 10%. Automated billing works great. Overall I am satisfied.

Review.Titre: Slow speeds for a business account …
Review.Contenu: Slow speeds for a business account fees.  Tucson needs fiber optic speeds to be competitive.  I had faster internet on an island in the middle of the Pacific ocean!
Experienced intermittent outages approximately once per month. Service has been responsive. Nevertheless, concerned about inconsistent reliability.
Still waiting ...... 2 weeks for soonest appt  so I have no reviews yet.  Keep getting email to rate so here it is.

Review.Titre: Called numerous numbers which gave a…
Review.Contenu: Called numerous numbers which gave a recording indicating I was number 1 in line then it would hang up.
Should provide higher speed Internet for residential customers and thère are times when Internet slows
Overall, a fairly good internet experience. It can be painfully slow at certain times of the day though.

Review.Titre: Customer service person was pretty much…
Review.Contenu: Customer service person was pretty much worthless on answering questions but did get me signed up.

Review.Titre: Thus far so good ...will not to service …
Review.Contenu: Thus far so good ...will not to service with anycable companies...great alternative!
It's alright but there are times in the day where it is slower than dial up.
At times it is really slow or no connection at all.
So far excellent customer service! Thank you!
Inconsistent download speed-often extremely slow
Average service (bandwidth) at higher cost.
Speed drop off,was faster before upgrading

Review.Titre: No one showed up to install
He was very helpful seting it up and…
Review.Contenu: He was very helpful seting it up and did not mind our dogs inspecting his work...
Good customer service. Our signal is somewhat sporadic and not consistent. The installation is lacking in quality and untidy.We are near Josephine Canyon in a valley. That may be part of the issue.

Very pleased with the installation process as a whole, but would have preferred to know in advance that the installer could not penetrate the roof while doing the installation. We got hooked up for the time being, but were advised that a return trip to move the cable at a future time would result in a charge of $150 for 15 minutes of time. Rather excessive when the entire installation is valued at $50. Other than that, we are pleased with the service!

Review.Titre: The Second technician who came to…
Review.Contenu: The Second technician who came to install my system was professional, helpful and patient in explaining the process. He installed the equipment and set up the system, was polite and helpful.  Great service and the internet is much faster than my previous service. All around a great change.
I recently switch to Simply bits from Century link So far so Good only been a week but haven't had any outage as we did with Century link.

Review.Titre: You do not throttle the internet like…
Review.Contenu: You do not throttle the internet like most companies do.  Unlimited gb.

Review.Titre: Very glad to have this internet…
Review.Contenu: Very glad to have this internet available in my area.  Installer was capable and very helpful.
I was seeking a internet provider that was dependable and offered consistent service compared to CenturyLink. So far service is far more reliable.

Review.Titre: The installer did an excellent job
Review.Contenu: The installer did an excellent job. He was friendly and knew what he was doing. Its to soon to rate the service.
The Installer is a professional. Went above and beyond. Rare.

Review.Titre: Great customer service and install... have I hopes for service.
Review.Contenu: Customer service was very knowledgeable and helpful. They were straight forward and honest. Installer was great to work with and did a very nice clean job. Have had internet for only a short while, but already it is a significant improvement over satellite. Only negative is that they are running out of available bandwidth so couldn't get as fast as speed as I would have liked - applaud them for not overselling their capacity! Hope the FCC will let them build new towers soon!

Review.Titre: Only feedback is when I had to call the…
Review.Contenu: Only feedback is when I had to call the 24/7 support desk following up with internet connection issues through new residential service.  Representatives were very apologetic but did not provided any clear answer and level of frustration kept going up to the extend that I was already searching for another provider. Thankfully Sabrina reached back to me with more knowledgeable background and expedite in person technical service released to my home and service was in place in the next few hours.  So far very happy with service

Review.Titre: I appreciated the honesty of everyone I…
Review.Contenu: I appreciated the honesty of everyone I worked with at Simply Bits.The sales person was kind in setting up a schedule that fit our needs and their resources. Unfortunately their tech guy couldn't find in signal from their tower in our area. Anthony, the tech guy, did a good job of answering my questions and the other options that might be available to us. Please keep me on the list of potential customers when you put up a new tower that will bring service to our area.

Review.Titre: I'm ultimately happy with my choice
Review.Contenu: I'm ultimately happy with my choice. The only thing that caught me off guard was paying twice in one month; everyone's bill generates on the 20th with payment due on the 25th. I just misread the terms. A bummer for my intentions with the other portion of my funds but I was happy I got such a quick call back after I requested an explanation of how billing works. These guys are amazing.

Review.Titre: I was satisfied but they brought the …
Review.Contenu: I was satisfied but they brought the coaxial cable from the dish into my junction box with six connectors and took one out and pulled their wire directly thru the hole to my computer. It should have been connected to the connector so I could screw on a short length of coaxial cable to connect to the computer. Not very professional and I will have to redo it soon.Never asked me or said anything. I discovered it the next day.

The tech who came out to get my service up and running was excellent.  The process of getting my service up and running was challenging but to be fair my mountain home has poor cell service and the tech told me that he has noted that the type of cell phone I have is challenging to use when starting my service.  He pointed out that my eero router/WiFi system only has one ethernet port (which he wasn't very happy about) but that the WiFi system is strong.  Overall I am happy with the system so far using only the WiFi for all my internet devices.

Signed up with Cheryl, very helpful and scheduled my install. Installer Jay showed up as scheduled and went to work. After quite a while, came down off the roof, apologized and said he was unable to find a signal. Great service from this company, too bad I couldn’t get a signal.....

Product was installed well but there are limits on where installers can go. For example cannot go in attic to make connections. I had to do this myself. Product operating very well with no drop in service over one year. Contract does not allow for vacation mode if gone for extended period of time. My ISP in another town provides this flexibility with appropriate limits.

Review.Titre: Overall satisfied; occasional outage which seems to be short and fixable
Review.Contenu: Mt. Lemmon usage, overall satisfactory and good speed.  I only have my Tucson local connection to compare, and it's comparable.  I appreciate the opportunity to support a local business and their willingness to be available if I have a question or problem which happens only infrequently.  The couple times I had to call for service, the staff was very personable and helpful and competent.  I appreciate Mike Bernstein's enthusiasm for our mountain!!

We use Simply Bits because we live outside of the Cox and Comcast areas. It has proven to be a reliable alternative and we have had no problems to date. We have been customers for over 3 years so I would recommend using Simply Bits to anyone who is dissatisfied with their other internet providers. The monthly cost has never increased either!

Internet works great, customer service was good when calling for installation. Haven't had any issues yet! I live in a rural area and there weren't many internet providers to choose from. Super happy I went with Simply Bits. Price is a bit high but I would definitely recommend to anyone with limited options!

Review.Titre: I am providing a review only on the…
Review.Contenu: I am providing a review only on the process of phone conversation to quotes services, explanation of plans and installation date. The customer service agent was polite, explained plans in detailed and received my business.  I hope the install and service are just as great.

I've been with SB for over seven years and i wanted to add a static IP to my account to view my security cameras outside my LAN. To my surprise for many years the fee was additional $5.00 per month but today they want a outrageous $15.00 per month or 300% increase.  ISP Bluespan charges only $5.00 for their Static IP but there fee's (Plans) are instructors differently then SB. Maybe it time to consider their competitor if security is important to you or me!

Can recall only one short, storm related outage in over seven years. Resetting credit card payment info when the card expires has been very easy. Speed is good. I've recommended Simply Bits to friends who are also happy with their service. I am glad that There is a great alternative to the big companies.

I have been on Simply Bits for over two years.  During that time I have had only two outages and neither lasted over about 5 minutes.  Any calls to find out why mine is operating slow received very courteous and knowledgeable help and all problems were with my router.  Good service at a pretty good rate.

Review.Titre: So far the sales team has been very…
Review.Contenu: So far the sales team has been very patient with me calling to insure I have compared all the competitors options correctly. The soonest installation is a bit farther out than desired at 2 weeks. Won’t be able to review quality and speed of internet for a few weeks yet.

Review.Titre: Hoping for a tower closer to my residence
Review.Contenu: The Simple Bits technicals were unsuccessful setting a good signal. They were very professional. One of the technical's told me, I would be notified when a tower was accessible to my residence. I hope it happens soon. Thanks for trying

Review.Titre: Very good after 2 months, hope SB keeps up.
Review.Contenu: We switched to SB because Sprocket could no longer provide the bandwidth we were paying for, and their customer support had deteriorated. We are in a semi-rural area 40 mi S of Tucson, where there are few ISP options, and SB was one of them.It's early, just 2 months since we switched, but SB bandwidth has been what we pay for without any dropouts, which were common with our previous provider. A big advantage is that we have a clean line of sight to one of their repeaters.My only reservation is that I wish SB were a little less expensive.

Review.Titre: Overall better than any other option
Review.Contenu: Simply Bits gave me an option of higher speed service than any other provider in my area. It has been good service with only occasional glitches, outages, etc. My only problem has been a persistent blip on my VOIP which I cannot seem to track either to Simply Bits or OOMA (my VOIP provider.)

I live in a remote area and had no internet at all.  At my install they were unable to install the router because I could not download the app that was required to set it up without internet. The technician tried everything to no avail. If they advertise setting up internet and cannot complete the install that is not good. That being said after I drove into the main town and purchased a router, I now have internet that works quite well. Simply Bits just needs to make a few installation changes. Luckily, my son knows about these things so he could buy the router and finish the install.

The customer service has always been great. We did have a short period of time where our service kept going out but the problem was found and fixed rather quickly. Even that was not nearly as bad as our daily experience with our previous provider. We have not had any issues since.

I am generally very satisfied with the service. My only issue was with the increasing of bandwidth without my knowledge, then being told that unless I upgrade at the contract term, my speed will drop to my old plan. Simply Bits should have told me they were doing this.

Review.Titre: Weekend tech support is a problem but service is very reliable.
Review.Contenu: I'm a residential customer, have been for 10 years.   Service is very reliable but if you have a problem on a weekend, tech support is hard to find.  My internet service seems better than that of CenturyLink, the only other broadband in my neighborhood.

We really love Simply Bits the only thing we struggle with is when our bandwidth falls short.  This usually happens during peak usage IE nights and weekends and its hard to get support due to your hours for support.  Other than that we love Simply Bits.

Review.Titre: The service can get slowed in the evening.
Review.Contenu: The 20g was put into affect after I became a customer so when they changed to a limit I was greatly suprized I was never told about this prior to the change nor properly explained to this date why they put the limit and throttle back my download's.

I like Simply Bits. They are local, friendly and a decent value. We live in a "Bermuda Triangle" for internet and electronics, so, for example, Cox would be very very slow sometimes. So, even though not perfect, Simply Bits is pretty solid.

Serviceman was very nice and tried to accommodate. Unfortunately, due to limitation in placement that would meet my satisfaction I was unable to move forward with installation.  Equipment was monstrous and needed to be placed in highly visible area, very unappealing. Did not approve of penetrating my roof for installation and would not agree to a nonpenetrating mount that is held down with bricks.It would serve you to provide better ability to mount on fascia board.More detailed communication regarding installation during initial call may have saved the poor technician time.Very kind service technician.

We've been happy with Simply Bits. It provides good internet connection for a fair price.  Customer service has been friendly and helpful. Our only complaint is occasional slow speeds that interrupt a video or prevent linking to a web site.

Review.Titre: Always there, wish it was faster
Review.Contenu: Simply Bits is a huge upgrade over the phone company internet which was painfully slow and down frequently.  Simply Bits is always there, great service, and decent speed.  Hope they can up the speed over time for improved streaming, etc.

Review.Titre: I'm ordering service from Simply Bits
Review.Contenu: I'm ordering service from Simply Bits, so I'm not actually a user, yet.  But I soon will be.  At this point in the process Simply Bits has shown me nothing but professionalism and courtesy.  A GREAT beginning!

Countries much smaller than ours are light years ahead of us. I'm not that far out and with technology where it is faster speeds are not only wanted but necessary  with 4K and all. Step it up SB and stop making excuses.

Hi, I like these folks - very responsive.    I just wish their service was a bit more reliable from where I am located - I get spotty coverage, and there is not other alternative at the moment (eg. cable or fiberoptic).

Review.Titre: Changed my internet provider to Simply Bits
Review.Contenu: I just changed my internet provider to Simply Bits after years of poor internet speeds and service from a provider that was the only choice for my location.  I began to hear good things about Simply Bits through my neighbors and so far have been very satisfied with the service.  Signup was easy - their app shows you the plans available for your area (there were several choices for me on the Far East side of Tucson) and a single phone call led to prompt service and installation.  So far my internet speeds approach what my plan promised and the internet is working well. I only give 4 stars because I have no long term history to go by, but so far I see no reason not to be able to give 5 stars in the future,

Review.Titre: As a new customer I am quite happy with…
Review.Contenu: As a new customer I am quite happy with the service I have received from Simply Bits.  The service technician was polite and efficient.  My questions were answered without hesitation.So far so good.

I am new with Simply Bits but getting installation and service was a breeze. I appreciate not getting mail from them like some other providers in town that spam mailboxes daily with their advertisements.
Wiring for DSL in our area is very old, and we have no cable providers. Terrestrial microwave service from Simply Bits is reliable.  It would be great if the cost was a bit more competitive.
The sales service was very accommodating and much easier and friendlier than any big cable company.  I like the feeling of a community-oriented company.
Wish the service was faster.  We have been with simplybits for more than 10 years and they never let us  know when the price changes and if  we could be on a better plan.

Review.Titre: The staff have all been very nice and…
Review.Contenu: The staff have all been very nice and we would love to have the service but the tech was not able to find a clear line of site from our house to their towers.
Love the service, way better than century link. Still wish we got a little faster speeds, but where we live I understand why we don't. Price isn't bad.
Highly recommended for people with little option of high speed internet providers. We have had no troubles with the internet since signing up with simply bits.
Not sure at times if it is your service or our security system that is giving us problems....but when you are called you always respond quickly.Thank you.
Only 2 outages in year and a half of services, but back up quickly.  Only issue, on occasion, is slow streaming; problem might well be with the DVD player.

Review.Titre: Few problems - often fixed quickly -- but light on Apple Knowledge
Review.Contenu: I am still using their slow, very spam infused mail system -- as last time they checked they had no-one to help me set up my Mac's 10.12.1 Mail System.
Service has been generally great however there are times particularly weekends when speed  donload more than upload drops to a minlimal unacceptable level

The installation tech, Austin, was wonderful. He explained everything he was going to do beforehand and installed the equipment as explained. He was on-time, professional, and courteous. He made sure we were up and running before leaving. This would have been a "5 star" review, but I am paying for the ultimate plan (25 Mbps) and have not reached that speed yet. Before Austin left, he explained that the tower from where we are receiving the signal is pretty full. So, he had to put us on tier 2 instead of 1. That's totally fine and I completely understand; however, I am still paying for 25 Mbps. I'm hoping the speeds will improve over time, but if not I may have to switch to a lower plan. With the exception of the speed issue, Simply Bits has been great and our internet has never been faster even at the lower speed. We were only getting 3 Mbps through our former internet company, so  even 10 Mbps is a huge improvement for us and we certainly notice the difference.
Unfortunately, Simply Bits was unable to provide my home with internet service. Nevertheless, everyone was kind and courteous.
We live out in the middle of nowhere.  Simply Bits gives us the access to internet at a reasonable price.  Not many problems.
In our area we are very limited with quality internet providers and simply bits is the best. They provide good service.

Review.Titre: I have much better internet service …
Review.Contenu: I have much better internet service than I had on Century Link.I am so grateful that someone told me about you.

Review.Titre: Once I actually got to talk to someone…
Review.Contenu: Once I actually got to talk to someone they were great, very knowledgeable and answered all my questions.
Very good customer service,friendly,attentive  and knowledge of services you providing.👍🏻
A good service.  Only a little slow sometimes at peak usage times. Would not change service.  Great price.

Review.Titre: Still have a little fluctuation on …
Review.Contenu: Still have a little fluctuation on speeds but a lot better service than we had with TransWorld Network
Works great, sometimes download times are a little slow, but no problems with streaming service on tvs

Review.Titre: QUIK SET UP AND ANSWERED ALL MY…
Review.Contenu: QUIK SET UP AND ANSWERED ALL MY QUESTIONS GAVE ME ADVICE ON WHAT OPTIONS TO GO WITH- THANK YOU!
Customer service is great. Service is sometimes unreliable, but overall I am a satisfied customer.

Review.Titre: Switched from HughesNet due to unfair billing/access policy.
Review.Contenu: Overall good, occasional unexpected slow-downs or service interruptions, usually resolved quickly.
Website is very friendly, contract as usual is difficult to understand and too long to read.

Review.Titre: Service is good but need more speed
Review.Contenu: Service is good. I wish they had faster download speeds at lower prices available in Rio Rico.

Review.Titre: The service has been very good and my …
Review.Contenu: The service has been very good and my only issue is the occasional slow loading of some files.
Better than any other service we had before. Consistently high down-and upload speeds.
Other than occasional disconnect and occasionally being a bit slow,  no problem.
All is good with services. Price is high.  Other than that all is good.
Some service inconsistency, but the local team tries to correct quickly.

Review.Titre: Fairly reliable no blow ups at least
Review.Contenu: Satisfied except no improvement in their speed capacity that I know of
no issues of service, happy with help for problems that have arised

Review.Titre: Friendly people, decent Internet connection, but their communications could use some work
Review.Contenu: Everyone I talked to was friendly and mostly helpful. The main problem was that after calling to arrange installation of my new service, the day for installation came and we were not on the schedule. It took me 4 tries to reach someone on the phone - I was disconnected 3 times - twice by the system transferring me to a number that rang and rang then just ended the call and once by someone transferring me to a wrong number. I'd say the phone system needs work. When I finally spoke to someone it took a bit because for some reason they thought our house was not in the service area, despite the fact that the previous owners had been using Simply Bits for years. And another thing - the previous owners, when they disconnected their service, both emailed and called Simply Bits to tell them to keep the equipment on site as the new owners (me) would be setting up service. Nope. they took the equipment anyway. (perhaps this is a policy - but seems odd - and maybe we ended up with newer equipment?  communication seems to be an issue). Renee, in sales, was able to work with the folks who do the installs to get us scheduled for install right away despite the fact that we somehow got dropped from their calendar. Brenden - the install tech - was friendly, knowledgeable, and efficient.  So far the service has been fine.  We are in a remote area so the speed is not the fastest, but told they should be upgrading the equipment in our area over the next year. I do hope this happens because my husband and I both work from home and often have to deal with large file transfers, so having faster speeds will be great.

Review.Titre: I have had positive experiences with Simply Bits.
Review.Contenu: Tech support has helped me because I'm not a computer person!
Minor billing concerns at start of service, cleared up later.

Review.Titre: Switched from century link to simply…
Review.Contenu: Switched from century link to simply Bits . So far so good

Review.Titre: Great service but the speed slows at …
Review.Contenu: Great service but the speed slows at times when streaming.
Good service for my limited choices on Internet providers.

Review.Titre: Sure beats Centurylinks 1.5 that I used…
Review.Contenu: Sure beats Centurylinks 1.5 that I used to get.
Fast connection for upgrade. Friendly staff
Occasional buffering affects streaming video.

Review.Titre: Needed help setting up router / Neil…
Review.Contenu: Needed help setting up router / Neil Lemme
Have had no problems with them.
Good, courteous service.
Better than expected
response , friendly and verky helpful
The installation was smooth and competent.  My internet connection is great and way, way better than Century Link.  I wish I had upgraded sooner.

Review.Titre: The installer showed up on time and…
Review.Contenu: The installer showed up on time and installed the new antenna.  The signal is very strong and we have had no problems using Zoom as both the audio and visual is working well.  The cost of the service in a bit on the high side, but not outrageous.

Tonya, who initiated transaction, was patient, helpful, and friendly. Installer was knowledgeable, competent, and creative. Todd devoted hours to seeing that we’d get the signal in a tricky situation. Service/reception is so far beyond what we’d had: we’re flabbergasted.

Amazing service!!! We finally can enjoy streaming without the annoying buffering! From the great phone customer service to our wonderful tech Donny, we are beyond pleased to be part of the Simply Bits family. Thank you all.
The installer was prompt, friendly, and worked quietly and efficiently.

Ms. Masters listened to my issue (temporary need to shut down the 5 GHz channel on my eero mesh network to connect security camera), called a colleague who could perform the temporary shutdown which only Simply Bits could do, and stayed on the line until her colleague reported shutdown successful.  I was able to connect the security camera and the 5 GHz channel restarted 15 minutes after the shutdown as promised.  On top of that, Ms. Masters called me back later (as she said she would) to confirm everything had worked out OK for me.

Review.Titre: Simply Bits came promptly to install…
Review.Contenu: Simply Bits came promptly to install service, technician Donny was thorough, helpful and extremely competent.  My system is working well--two computers, two tvs, 2 cell phones and some small devices.  We were able to speak to people when we called, to check on progress, etc.  In other words, we had service!!! we were not just trying to glean info from an unhelpful machine.

Review.Titre: Today was my first appointment with a…
Review.Contenu: Today we had two excellent installers come out and install our new antenna and modem. Donnie and Justin were gentlemen and got us going with three times the band width of Bluespan, same price and no contract. Thank you, Simply BitsToday was my first appointment with a Simply Bits salesperson name Shaun. So far, my experience couldn't be better. Shaun was calm, clear, authentic and friendly. My install will happen within the next ten days. If everything goes like today, I'll be a very happy customer.

Review.Titre: My Positive Experience With Simply Bits
Review.Contenu: Let me begin by saying that I am not a tech savvy individual; however, from my initial inquiry to the day of installation I encountered complete answers and courtesy.  This was such a glorious contrast from my experience with our previous provider.  On the day of installation our daughter came over to help me understand. Our installer was really informative and answered all our questions.I would recommend this company to anyone.

Review.Titre: Jason was very professional in his…
Review.Contenu: Jason was very professional in his presentation by his mannerism and working on my roof.  But unfortunately, we couldn't make the connection.  I live in Swan Lake Estates that another resident is proud to be your customer.  I'm towards the back of out Swan Lak Adult Community - Manufacture homes. Too many trees in-between not able to connect.  If you ever get a higher reach please contact me because my friend loves your service. I need help.

Review.Titre: My first time using Microwave internet…
Review.Contenu: My first time using Microwave internet but it delivers the goods. No buffer at all. I like the fact it is just like CenturyLink bcz the Brand names that use cable slow down on weekends but not this service. 5 stars so far. Keep up the good internet service Simply bits. It’s a tad more expensive but blows away Hughes Net and the other Satellite companies by far far far. Don’t get stuck with slow satellite! Get something that will perform everyday! Simply simply Bits.

The installer came out, looked around the property and figured the best place for us to receive the signal.  Prior to his visit we had been told we couldn't receive a signal from our location.  We had called 3 separate times over the past few years with hopes there was a new tower or a stronger signal we could connect to with Simply Bits.  We are really please with the reception we are receiving!  The past 14 years with Century Link has been HORRIBLE.  The installer was professional, cleaned up after himself and was considerate of our space.  We highly recommend Simply Bits!

Review.Titre: Suzette was EXCELLENT helping to solve…
Review.Contenu: Suzette was EXCELLENT helping to solve issue with TV hookups.  She listened to my issue and made a very reasonable suggestion to fix- don't use the same WiFi name ... TVs were stuck on the prior name and password.  TV Customer Service didnt suggest that.... THANKS Suzette!Installation went very well..VERY happy with SP so far !

I was ready to switch providers and Simply Bits caught my eye.  They had good reviews and the real plus was free installation.  The person that scheduled me was good and patient with all my questions and the service tech that did the installation was very professional.  Overall, Simply Bits made a good first impression and hope this will continue during my use.

Review.Titre: Customer service by the installer was…
Review.Contenu: Customer service by the installer was done efficiently.  The installer took his time to ensure that the system worked and that we were able to connect our devices.  He spent a lot of time trying to get our lap top computers to connect to the wifi system, but to no avail.  It was determined that one computer was outdated and wouldn't connect to the system while the second lap top did finally connect. Our internet speeds have greatly improved over the previous provider who would not correct the exposed phone lines in our back yard after 4 years of negelect.

Talked to real people. Tanya, in the sales dept., was very friendly and helpful. Jay, the technician who came to do the signal signal sighting and installation was friendly, helpful, listened to the guidelines provided, and did his best to do meet my needs!! Very knowledgeable and insightful! Thank you, Simply Bits!!

Review.Titre: Over 20 years of terrible internet service....SOLVED!!

Even with the mansion season I don’t notice a difference, the signal never drops. I would definitely reccomended it for someone who’s had the same problem in the past like I did.

They had someone out within 36 hours in a 4 - not 9 (looking at you, CenturyLink) and got the job done right resulting in flawless service, which I really appreciate.

Beyond that, he helped me on board as my internet skills are basic.At all times he was efficient and pleasant to have in my home.  I am a 25 year retiree from the telephone industry and I know good service.

For nearly two decades, I got my Internet from a national company that isn't renowned for its customer service.I experienced this during Easter weekend. On Holy Saturday, my Internet died.Oh, goodie. Another outage.Easter Sunday dawned bright and sunny. But my Internet service had yet to experience a resurrection.So, I called National Company’s local number. After I navigated through a lengthy voice mail trail, a recorded voice told me that the office was closed and I should try my call again later. No mention of when “later” was. The voice mail said nothing about office hours.On Easter Monday, I called National Company again. Got a live human! Who transferred me to tech support!Which was overseas.Although I had difficulty understanding the lady, she reset my modem.As soon as I was back online, I went to the Simply Bits website and signed up for local service. What a difference. Unlike National Company, which sent a whole team of installers to my house, Simply Bits sent one guy who got the whole installation done in a couple of hours.Count me as a fan!
We couldnt be happier.  Don did the installation and was very knowledgeable, courteous, and  he explained everything that needed to be done.  He was also very willing to answer any questions we had.
